mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin_account ( emp_id, password, name, phone, email, position, role, profile_img_url, dept_id, license_no, status, hired_date, created_at ) VALUES ( #{empId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{position}, 'ADMIN', #{profileImgUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId}, #{licenseNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ACTIVE', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a left JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE position = 'DOCTOR' ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
SELECT a.*, d.dept_name FROM admin_account a left JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE position IN ('NURSE', 'RADIOLOGIST', 'LAB_TECH', 'ASSISTANT', 'ADMIN') ORDER BY a.admin_id DESC
mapper.update:
UPDATE admin_account
name = #{name},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
position = #{position},
dept_id = #{deptId},
status = #{status},
profile_img_url = #{profileImgUrl},
password = #{password},
WHERE admin_id = #{adminId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.admin_id AS adminId, a.name AS name, a.position AS position, a.dept_id AS deptId, d.dept_name AS deptName, IFNULL(AVG(r.rating), 0) AS rating FROM admin_account a JOIN department d ON a.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN admin_review r ON a.admin_id = r.admin_id WHERE a.position = 'DOCTOR' GROUP BY a.admin_id ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 10
